title: Singed Body Pillow.
body:
Ok Idea
Front: Singed running at you
Back: Entirely Green

Back of the pillow should smell like Chlorine.

Front of the pillow needs to be slighty damp and smell like socks.

I know where to get Chlorine and socks i nust need the case.

Suggestions? Fabric type?

replies.body: Make it chloroform for a slow
who are you and how are you so wise in the ways of science?
